channel.title: CVE Feed for Martin Gibson -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-49275|2024-10-20T13:40:28.178Z -- martin%20gibson -- ideapush
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Martin Gibson IdeaPush allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects IdeaPush: from n/a through 8.69.
